backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining College data types and functions for adding/retrieving colleges, searching by name/program, answering FAQ questions, and tracking user query history.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: chat interface component, frontend-backend integration, and warm academic visual theme with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing styling, configuration, components, hooks, and pages for the college inquiry chatbot application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space with warm academic color palette and design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the College Inquiry Chatbot application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping ChatPage in QueryClientProvider for React Query state management.
frontend/src/components/ChatInput.tsx: Textarea-based chat input component with send button, loading state, Enter-to-send functionality (Shift+Enter for newlines), and disabled state support.
frontend/src/components/ChatInterface.ts: Main chat interface container with header, scrollable message area with auto-scroll, and input section, integrating ChatMessage and ChatInput components.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Individual message bubble component displaying user or bot messages with avatars, timestamps, and distinct styling based on sender.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Application layout wrapper providing header with branding, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handling anonymous and authenticated states, and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChat.ts: Custom hook managing chat message state, sending user questions to backend via useAskQuestion mutation, and handling responses and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching colleges, individual college details, asking questions, and adding new colleges with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm academic color scheme (earth tones, greens, browns) for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Main chat page component that loads colleges, initializes sample college data if empty, and renders the ChatInterface within a Layout wrapper.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with custom fonts (Inter, Merriweather, Playfair Display), OKLCH color system, academic-themed shadows, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the college inquiry chatbot's features, architectural notes, pending feature requests, and design requirements including warm academic styling.
